item.title: Chrome DevTools: Debugging JavaScript
item.description: Step 1: Reproduce the bug Finding a series of actions that consistently reproduces a bug is always the first step to debugging. Step 2: Get familiar with the Sources panel UI After opening the DevTools by pressing Command+Option+J on Mac, click the Sources tab. This is where we debug JavaScript. It has 3 main parts: (1) Top left: File Navigator pane This is where we can see and inspect every files that the page requests.
